mapper.select: select id,type,name from t_yp_institutions_conditions where is_deleted=0 order by order_code desc

mapper.insert: insert into t_yp_institutions_conditions (id, uuid, is_deleted, create_time, order_code, delete_time, remarks, attachment, type, name) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
